Donald Rumsfeld , who has known Hosni Mubarak for decades, responded carefully when asked whether he is a dictator. He clearly has perpetuated himself in office. There have been a number of things that have inhibited freer political systems, Donald Rumsfeld said of the Egyptian president, stopping short of offering any further criticism of Hosni Mubarak . Chrysler is debating the future of its minivans even as it starts making the 2011 Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town and Country this week. We need to completely rethink the minivan, CEO Sergio Marchionne said Tuesday at the Canadian plant where Chrysler's minivans are made.
